career_paths.title: Junior Web Developer
responsibilities: Assist in the development and maintenance of web applications.
Implement front-end designs using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Collaborate with senior developers to troubleshoot issues and optimize website performance.
requirements: Proficiency in web development languages and frameworks (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular, Vue.js).
Understanding of web standards and responsive design principles.
Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and web development tools.

career_paths.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Design, develop, and deploy software solutions for various platforms.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following best practices and coding standards.
requirements: Proficiency in one or more programming languages (e.g., Python, Java, C++, C#).
Experience with software development methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum).
Familiarity with software engineering tools and practices (e.g., IDEs, unit testing, code reviews).

career_paths.title: Machine Learning Engineer/Data Scientist
responsibilities: Develop machine learning models to solve business problems and extract insights from data.
Preprocess and analyze large datasets using statistical techniques and machine learning algorithms.
Deploy and monitor models in production environments.
requirements: Strong background in mathematics, statistics, and machine learning concepts.
Proficiency in programming languages commonly used in data science (e.g., Python, R).
Experience with machine learning libraries and frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn).

career_paths.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
responsibilities: Monitor and analyze security alerts and incidents to detect and respond to threats.
Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing to identify security weaknesses.
Implement security controls and best practices to protect systems and data.
requirements: Knowledge of cybersecurity principles, protocols, and technologies.
Familiarity with security tools such as SIEM, IDS/IPS, firewalls, and antivirus software.
Understanding of compliance requirements and industry standards (e.g., GDPR, PCI DSS, ISO 27001).

career_paths.title: Mobile App Developer
responsibilities: Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and/or Android platforms.
Implement UI designs and features using mobile development frameworks.
Collaborate with designers and backend developers to integrate app functionality.
requirements: Proficiency in mobile app development languages and frameworks (e.g., Swift, Kotlin, React Native, Flutter).
Understanding of mobile app design principles and best practices.
Familiarity with mobile app testing and deployment processes.

career_paths.title: Network Specialist
responsibilities: Design, implement, and maintain computer networks.
Monitor network performance and troubleshoot issues.
Implement security measures to protect network systems and data.
requirements: Knowledge of network protocols and technologies (e.g., TCP/IP, DNS, VPN).
Experience with network hardware and software (e.g., routers, switches, firewalls).
Understanding of network security principles and best practices.

career_paths.title: Software Quality Assurance (SQA) Engineer
responsibilities: Develop and execute test plans and test cases to ensure the quality and reliability of software products.
Identify and report defects, and work with development teams to resolve issues.
Automate test cases and regression testing processes to improve efficiency.
requirements: Knowledge of software testing methodologies and tools (e.g., Selenium, JIRA, TestRail).
Understanding of software development processes and lifecycle.
Strong attention to detail and analytical skills.

career_paths.title: IT Specialist
responsibilities: Provide technical support to end-users on hardware and software issues.
Troubleshoot IT problems and implement solutions.
Manage IT assets, including procurement and inventory.
requirements: Knowledge of computer hardware and software systems.
Strong problem-solving and communication skills.
Ability to work well independently and in a team.

career_paths.title: Higher Study
responsibilities: Pursue Master's degrees in specialized fields such as:
- Computer Science
- Information Technology Management
- Data Science
- Cybersecurity
- Software Engineering
requirements: Obtain industry certifications to enhance skills and credentials, such as:
- Project Management Professional (PMP)
- Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect
- Google Certified Professional Cloud Architect
career_paths.salary_range_bangladesh: Varies based on specialization and level of education
